title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 150.1 - Document size and backer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 150.1 - Document size and backer

State Regulations

All paper documents offered for filing must include a backer, thereon which appears the exact title of the document and the name and address
of the filer. The backer for documents related to an entity currently on file
with the division must include the Department of State identification number
assigned to the entity. Documents on paper shall be no larger than 81/2 inches
by 11 inches. Documents not on paper, where allowed, shall be of a size and in
a medium consistent with the technology used by the Department of State to
receive, make, and retain the resulting record. Title on the backer must be
consistent with the content of the document. Notes

New

York State Register June 16, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 24, eff. 6/21/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
